And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1027>thunder<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the voice which I <S%G191>heard<s%> was as the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G2790>harpers<s%> <S%G2789>harping<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2788>harps<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G103>sing<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G5603>song<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G1487>the<s%> <S%G5603>song<s%> <S%G3361>save<s%> the <S%G1540>hundred<s%> and <S%G5062>forty<s%> and <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G5505>thousand<s%>, even they <S%G3588>that<s%> had been <S%G59>purchased<s%> <S%G575>out<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> they <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3435>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3435>defiled<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3933>virgins<s%>. <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> they <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> whithersoever3699, Leviticus2 he <S%G5217>goeth<s%>. <S%G3778>These<s%> were <S%G59>purchased<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> among <S%G444>men<s%>, to be the <S%G536>firstfruits<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> unto the <S%G721>Lamb<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1388>lie<s%>: <S%G1063><s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> without <S%G299>blemish<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4072>flying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> mid <S%G3321>heaven<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> good <S%G2098>tidings<s%> to <S%G2097>proclaim<s%> unto them that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> unto <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5443>tribe<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%>;

and he <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> that <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2281>and<s%> <S%G2532>sea<s%> <S%G2281>and<s%> <S%G4077>fountains<s%> of <S%G5204>waters<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G243>another<s%>, a second <S%G32>angel<s%>, <S%G190>followed<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G4098>Fallen<s%>, <S%G4098>fallen<s%> is <S%G897>Babylon<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> hath <S%G4222>made<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> to <S%G4222>drink<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> another <S%G32>angel<s%>, a <S%G5154>third<s%>, <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G4352>worshippeth<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>receiveth<s%> a <S%G5480>mark<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3359>forehead<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G929>torment<s%> goeth <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G372>rest<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G3588>they<s%> that <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1536>whoso<s%> <S%G2983>receiveth<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>.

Here <S%G5602><s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G5281>patience<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G5602><s%> they that <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G3427><s%> <S%G1125>Write<s%>, <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> are the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> from <S%G534>henceforth<s%>: <S%G3483>yea<s%>, <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G373>rest<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2873>labors<s%>; <S%G1161>for<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> with <S%G3326>them<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2400>behold<s%>, a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G3507>cloud<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3507>cloud<s%> I saw one <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> unto a <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G4735>crown<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%>, <S%G2896>crying<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a great <S%G5456>voice<s%> to <S%G3588>him<s%> that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3507>cloud<s%>, Send <S%G3992>forth<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1407>sickle<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2325>reap<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> to <S%G2325>reap<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%>; 4671, 2325 <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G2326>harvest<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> is <S%G3583>ripe<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3507>cloud<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1407>sickle<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> was <S%G2325>reaped<s%>.

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G243>Another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%>, he that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G5455>called<s%> with a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2906>voice<s%> to <S%G3588>him<s%> that <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Send <S%G3992>forth<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G1407>sickle<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5166>gather<s%> the <S%G1009>clusters<s%> of the <S%G1093>vine<s%> of the <S%G3754>earth<s%>; for <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4718>grapes<s%> are fully <S%G187>ripe<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> cast <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1407>sickle<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5166>gathered<s%> the <S%G288>vintage<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> it <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3025>winepress<s%>, the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3025>winepress<s%>, of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3025>winepress<s%> was <S%G3961>trodden<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3025>winepress<s%>, even <S%G891>unto<s%> the <S%G5469>bridles<s%> of the <S%G2462>horses<s%>, as far <S%G575>as<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> and six <S%G1812>hundred<s%> <S%G4712>furlongs<s%>.
